oai_dc:dc.dc:title: National Boulevard on Missionary Ridge, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color tinted photograph of National Boulevard on Missionary Ridge in Chattanooga, Tennessee. A carriage can be seen going down the boulevard and a house is visible in the distance. A stone wall lines the right side of the road. Features a white border and divided back. [No. 111379]
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Missionary Ridge (Tenn. and Ga.); Chattanooga (Tenn.); Hamilton County (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Roads; Houses; Trees; Stone walls
